name: Typing Your Bass
description:
Spell the names of fish while casting your rod to make impressive catches, and learn entirely accurate statistics and fun facts about a funny number of your favourite swimmers. Now that's magical.

Game created in the 48 hour period; all the art was generated using OpenAI DALL-E. That's why it looks so doofy. Also ate away like 40 of my credits. I was saving those for making funnies. Grr.
